name: Blizzard
effect: Roll 1 Chance Dice to Freeze those affected. If performed under Hail Weather or Snow Weather, Ignore this moves Reduced Accuracy and the Move can't be evaded. If performed under Sunny Weather Accuracy becomes -3 instead. -2 Accuracy.
description: The user swirls a violent gelid wind around the foes. This blizzard may not last long, but it is tremendously strong.
